head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCABE, MARGUERITE (NEE MURPHY).

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCCABE, MARGUERITE (NEE MURPHY).

block.p: McCABE-Marguerite (nee Murphy). On October 4, 2000, at age 89. Beloved wife of Robert Dale McCabe; Devoted mother of Maureen and Patricia; Cherished grandmother of Christopher, Timothy, Kevin, Robert, Andrew, Matthew and Stephen Brown, Mary Ellen Hunter and Marguerite Phaneuf; Great-grandmother of Sarah, Meghan, Conor, Kaitlyn, Stephen, William, Taylor, Grace, Anne Marie and Sydney. Visitation Friday 2-5 and 7-9PM at Dimiceli & Sons Funeral Home, 182 Lexington Ave, NYC. Mass of Christian Burial Saturday 10:30 AM at The Church of Our Saviour. Interment at Calvary Cemetery. In lieu of flowers friends may make donations in Marguerite's name to Father Frank Pavone, Priest's For Life, Staten Island, New York.
